description:
HealthIT Dashboard Certified Electronic Health Record (CEHRT) Vendors and Products
The Medicare and Medicaid Electronic Health Record (EHR) Incentive Programs provide incentives to eligible ambulatory and inpatient providers to adopt electronic health records, and the ONC Health IT Regional Extension Centers (REC) Program provides assistance to providers to adopt and meaningfully use EHRs. These data provide the counts of health care providers that have reported a vendors product through participation in either the CMS EHR Incentive Programs or ONC REC Program. The data are provided beginning in April, 2011. If you have any questions or concerns about this documentation, please contact ONC.RequestAThhs.gov. You can access the data in multiple formats on the data page or below. This is an ongoing project managed by the Office of the National Coordinator for Health Information Technology, an agency of the Department of Health and Human Services.
title: HealthIT Dashboard CEHRT Vendors and Products
